Using supplied service policies
RICOH ProcessDirector provides these predefined service policies: 3-day cutoff and 24 hour. You can change the properties of the supplied
service policies and use them in your installation. Or, you can delete them if they are not useful.
To use a supplied service policy:
1. Click the Administration tab.
2. In the left pane, click Objects â‡’ Service Policies.
3. Right-click the service policy that you want to use and select Properties.
4. In the properties notebook, click the tabs to see different properties, or click Show all to display all the properties on a single page. To see
information about any of the properties, click the icon next to the property name.
5. Make the appropriate changes.
6. Click OK.
7. Assign the service policy to one or more workflows.
